attributes.action: Give Car Enthusiasts in South Wales a safe space away from local communities.
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone else gets to have their spaces.
Teenagers get youth clubs / skate parks.
The working man/woman get his/her pub or club.
Some drag strips do exist. In England & Scotland. However there aren’t any patches of land in Wales that allows us to park up and be social without interference from local authorities who move us on and just pushes the problem elsewhere and wastes police resources.
attributes.background:
Car enthusiasts often commandeer car parks related to businesses whom do not want us there.

Quite often the noise also carries over to local communities who take to social media to complain and often results in police being contacted.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
